article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded $142 Million Arrowhead Production Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Army has awarded Lockheed Martin a $142 million follow-on production contract for the Apache Arrowhead system, the combat-proven, Modernized Target Acquisition Designation Sight/Pilot Night Vision Sensor (M-TADS/PNVS) for the AH-64D Apache attack helicopter.
